channel.title: Graves and stuff
channel.description:
[u]ok i see a object and one of the things are push graves, anyway that when u click it , can it actually move back probally not but jw, and when you push it back like a npc comes out?[/u]
grave id = 5167

item.title: Graves and stuff
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

sure you can lol.

If you can find a summoning method which makes an npc appear and find the GFX, then its all good.

So outcome will be like:

case 5167:
stillgfx(GRAVEMOVINGGFX, absY, absX);
//NPC method here IE: summonNPC(NPCID);
break;

Read full topic
